name: Shapeshifting Adventure
description:
A game that transforms to make your journey way harder!

Shapeshifting Adventure is a 2D platformer-adventure game with unorthodox game mechanics and nasty traps! This game will challenge endurance and your ability to solve puzzles!

You are asked by a woman to help her retrieve a stolen artefact from the local museum. Will you successfully retrieve it, or will you fall victim to the endless traps throughout your journey?

Featuring

  • A half-vampire protagonist!
  • Unorthodox game and level designs!
  • Puzzles, puzzles everywhere!
  • An unfair journey!
  • Humorous situations!
  • A beam gun.

Remember to think outside the box!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
